name: havenless
text: Hell, i'd start buying from subway if they had ads like that.

name: mr_pete
text: This was written by a man who knows what hard looks like.

name: killingthejay
text: Green beret rape Jared's face. He rape Jared's hand. Does Jared cry? Yes.

name: clembot
text: This one is classic vlad.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Moolah, thetrashman, HollyBones, Darthemed)

name: luckypyjamas
text:
or into a biscuit.

that would be symbolic of his triumph

name: jonmw
text: No, he craps JARED into a biscuit

name: snowman
text: and they're still flaming

name: centipede_damascus
text: Vlad comes from hard times. He has no respect for the weak or soft among us.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Vlad comes from cyber-gulag in former Soviet Republic of Dreckistan. He was made from surplus T-47 Tankski.

name: ssddr
text: I enjoy the use of "wiener" as an adjective.

name: delzhand
text: I love Teodor's indignant look in 1 and 2.

name: rational
text: Yes, but what's with his arms in the first two panels? Pre-Subway yoga? Homage to Chuck Norris?

name: rational
text: Ohhh. Now I see. He's covering his vitals 'cause the fire .

name: madnes
text: OK, so "sex appeal of biscuit with two shits inside" makes me laugh in a gross snorty way at work. Noted.

name: scramblesthedog
text: This strip is basically a 3 with the exception of that line.  Which is a five.  THOUSAND.

name: sredni
text: I absolutely agree

name: odei
text: I read that line and voted five before I even thought about voting.

name: judahnielsen
text: A comment left by judahnielsen was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ImitationCrab, gormster, Connellingus, farqussus, Nessotron, scramblesthedog)

name: drskradley
text:
"Biscuit with two shits inside"

Otherwise known as "Limp Bizkit"

name: overmedicated
text: You called?

name: cicadalek
text: You can tell he's going to let that Falmik Sub burn out and sell it to Philippe anyway.

name: foetus_punch
text: What? WHAT?

name: tekende
text: The homo says what two times, dear foetus_punch?

name: foetus_punch
text: Huh?

name: fineoakstructure
text: In case you're generally confused, I kindly redirect you to this strip

name: fineoakstructure
text: (generally = genuinely)

name: epicurus
text: oh my fucking GOD I love this one. I keep imagining the green beret punching him in the heart and he crumples down clutching his chest, coughs up blood, and moans for like twenty seconds before he dies. It is really, really funny and now I look insane.

name: songbirdspectre
text:
"it is really, really funny" always improves a story that may or may not be funny.

chubby.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: I was gonna say. I can't be the only person here who can find himself cracking up just more and more and more at a strip the more comments I read.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: I keep imagining the R.L. Jared being shown this strip by a "friend".

name: epicurus
text:
OH, I forgot: It takes Jared about 20 seconds of agony to die. These 20 seconds are spent in a very slow extreme close-up of his contorted face. No music plays as he grunts and gasps his last.

Just as he shudders and stills, the subway logo pops up. Subway!

Eat fresh!

name: clembot
text: i agree classic vlad

name: qatipay
text: In the last panel, Teodor seriously considers this proposition.

name: qingofchina
text: I good punch to the heart is pretty hard to beat. But you can't always tell that its a punch to the heart, so jared would have to scream AUUGH MY HEAAART

name: tonyhighwind
text: "WHY DID YOU PUNCH MY HEART?  AUUGH!  WHYYYYY?"

name: songbirdspectre
text: I almost peed my pants. I laughed so hard that I died.

name: stuart
text: A comment left by stuart was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Badganjil, ohmygooses, fmercury, Wulvaine, I_Love_Kate)

name: songbirdspectre
text: aw mannnnn

name: pitseleh
text: Good God. I wish I could see the commercial come to be. That would make me so happy.

name: foetus_punch
text: Your avatar makes that comment hilarious...it also makes Phillipe seem bloodthirsty. Disturbingly cute.

name: josher
text: On the subject of Achewood borrowings, I frequently describe bad things that I encounter as being like "a biscuit with two shits inside".

name: shoinan
text: Girls would rather sleep with a biscuit with two shits inside than with Jared.

name: grtfldvr
text: Agreed, he's hella terrible. I always thought Jared was rogering Clay the Fireman from that one 'real people' Subway commercial until I saw where he got married...to a girl.

name: grtfldvr
text:
Clay Henry slides down the firepole as his jingle plays in the backgrownd.

His name is Henry
Clay Henry
He's a fireman and a Jared fan
From Subway

He got real big on burgers and fries
Now he's down to a smaller size
Gets his might from his veggie delight
Great taste each day from his local Subway

He's Henry
Clay Henry

name: spinynorman
text: Jokes filtered through Choppy Russian Dialect gain 40-80% hilarity.

name: sexualhomeboy
text: In Soviet Russia, hilarious jokes gain 40-80% Russian dialect.

name: bjorntd
text: In Soviet Russia, a chubby has you!

name: lux
text: Hot.

name: lucid
text: Through reading Achewood I have realised that Eastern European English is far more hilarious than any poorly translated Japanese.

name: mountaindewtab
text: i would like to be that green beret

name: johnmatrix
text: A comment left by johnmatrix was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by orvel, TonyHighwind, farqussus, theplaidknight, aparrish)

name: presterjohn
text:
I too enjoy taking jokes and trimming off the excess funny.
Seriously, what the hell, man?

name: johnmatrix
text: A comment left by johnmatrix was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by orvel, TonyHighwind, farqussus)

name: shoinan
text: Dude, two shits in a biscuit will never roll off the tongue nicely.

name: johnmatrix
text: I knew someone would say that.

name: shoinan
text: Proof that the lack of a delete button works!

name: farqussus
text: so does "get 'er done." Are you that guy?

name: overman
text: I love biscuts.

name: charchar
text: Still? you're a far better person than I.

name: charchar
text: yo, could 'Flamink' be perhaps a Jared slam or..a wish?

name: mattylite
text: One day I'm gonna wipe my ass with the thickest slices of the freshest-baked bread.  But 'til then I guess I'll just keep shittin' in these biscuits.

name: mattylite
text: All squattin' over the griddle, servin' 'em up like this:

name: straw
text:
That picture has driven me to drink.

I mean, I was drinking already, but, you know.

name: jezebel
text: You, too?  Cheers.

name: fineoakstructure
text: McDonald's, where "growing your brand" means actually branding the fucking food with a hot iron "M".

name: hereward
text: The thing I like is the animate lines around the sandwich in 2nd panel, as if Vlad's hand is shaking in eagerness for teodor to take it.

name: snowman
text: Teodor's defensive posture arms win.

name: invidious
text: This was the strip my roommate sent me the link to that was my introduction to Achewood.  I voted this strip a five only because I couldn't give it a fifty.  That last line is the greatest.

name: tessebatt
text: Oh God. Vlad. Classic Vlad. I so love this guy. So love.

name: alaric101
text: I laff because I am a cruel cold hearted bastard. I wonder if Vlad spent anytime in a Stalinist workcamp...

name: mikeronomicon
text: I just laughed so hard milk duds came out my nose and all over my monitor. Good thing I'm at work.

name: fancyrat
text: Yet another Achewood phrase absorbed into my vernacular. I now refer to Steve Buscemi as having the sex appeal of a biscuit with two shits inside.

name: brokeaccount
text: Damn that sandwich is gonna be burned all to hell by the time anyone gets around to eating it.
